content: I actually already got a screen protector earlier this month from a kiosk at the mall. It was only $5, so I thought, why not? However, the guy who applied it did a terrible job, and there are bubbles all over the place. I've been meaning to go back and ask him to redo it, but I haven't had the time yet. Maybe I should just get a new one from a reputable brand like you mentioned.
